features.headline: Freshly Grown In Antigua
features.body: We grow and harvest our greens our greens are grown indoors.So we are able to  offer optimal growing conditions that make our plants healthy and strong. To ensure you are getting the full benifits of Micro Greens. Espically in Antigu's blazing hot weather. We prepare soil  greens in an controlled environment that is also pest-free and weed-free, to completely eliminating any use of harmful chemicals or pesticides.

features.headline: Can Be Used In Many Diets
features.body: Urban Greens has an array of greens. So you can use it in specific dishes, and take advantage of the maximum vitamins, minerals, fibre, and antioxidants. Lots of cooks like to use micro greens for their strong aromatic qualities and nutritional content. It gives the dish character and enhances the flavour. Micro greens are also very flexible, you can visit facebook and instagram page to see how our community uses our greens to improve their lifestyle.

features.headline: Sustainable Packaging
features.body: We care about the environment and encourage you to reuse our packaging. Which is why we made it sustainable. What does sustainable mean? It means you can re-use the package however you like. Or send it back our way. Our goal is to get the most out of our packaging so it we do not harm our beautiful island.
